trigger.name: Active Alarms: {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger.description: Warning! Storage pool exhaust alert is ignored by this trigger!

trigger_prototype.name: Controller {#SNMPVALUE} Unavailable (shut down or dead)
trigger_prototype.description: Health Status and Running status OIDs become unavailable when controller is shut down.

item_prototype.name: Pool {#SNMPVALUE} Subscribed Capacity
item_prototype.description: Записано в пул фактически (для Dorado - после Data Reduction , Compression и Deduplication)

discovery_rule.name: LUN
discovery_rule.description:
Was discovery[{#LUNID},.1.3.6.1.4.1.34774.4.1.19.9.4.1.1,{#LUNNAME},.1.3.6.1.4.1.34774.4.1.19.9.4.1.2]
Usually {#LUNID} is equal to {#SNMPINDEX} but this behaviour is not guaranteed by manufacturer. Performance OIDs have REFERENCE to ID of monitored LUN, not {#SNMPINDEX} equal to monitored LUN ID.

macro.description: Ping trigger fires when no ping for {$NO_PING_PERIOD}
Regex for IP interfaces to not monitor with Ping
Regex for IP interfaces to monitor with Ping
